body.name: Clothes Steamer Travel, HOMEASY Handheld Steamer for Clothes Garment Steamer Portable Iron Clothes Steamer Fabric Wrinkle Remover with Fast 25s Heat-up Detachable Water Tank, Blue

features: CLOTHES STEAMER DESIGN FOR TRAVEL & HOME - HOMEASY handheld clothes steamer travel is designed with 1.8m extra-long cord for convenient steaming. Its detachable design and compact size makes it a perfect travel companion for carrying on luggage. Look no more for rusty and inefficient borrowed irons at your travel destinations. Get this hand steamer to make life and work easier.

25s FAST HEAT-UP & SMALL BODY BUT POWERFUL ENERGY - Thanks to its ergonomic nozzle and lightning fast heating technology, our handheld garment steamer for clothes ensures quick steaming performances in less than 25 seconds. 150ml large water tank with 1000W supercharged power provides up to 10 minutes of steaming, you don't have to refill water frequently. Steam ironing 3-4 T-shirt at a time.

DRY IRONING FUNCTION - This portable fabric steamer iron works great in both hang ironing and flat ironing. Hand ironing is the steam mode while flat ironing is dry ironing. No worry about leaks or water spitting. The steam panel will reach a high temperature of 140°C after preheating and you can use it for dry ironing directly without pressing the steam button.

5 in 1 MULTI-FUNCTIONAL HANDHELD STEAMER - Including perfect brush makes it a versatile machine with five functions - ironing, sterilization, humidification, wrinkle and dust removal. The steamer iron is suitable for most fabrics such as carpets, curtains, bedding, cushions, pillow, sofa, kids toy stuffed.

HOMEASY garment steamer for clothes is safe enough to use. The portable iron steamer will automatic shut-off when the reservoir runs dry or the unit gets too hot. More durable and heat-shielding with high quality ABS material, never worry about hand scald and burnt fabrics.
body.description: HOMEASY Portable Handheld Garment Steamer for Clothes HOMEASY handheld steamer for clothes is a perfect helper as it effectively removes wrinkles with 45% more steam output per minute.The 7-hole nozzle and wide steam exit penetrates steam into more fabric area thoroughly and the 20G/MIN steam flow comes out powerfully and evenly to remove the toughest wrinkles. Preheating Time: 25s Power：1000W Constant Steaming: 8 mins Water Tank Capacity: 150ML Special Features: Detachable Water Tank & Compact Size

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HOMEASY Clothes Steamer Travel, Handheld Steamer for Clothes Garment Portable Iron Clothes Steamer Fabric Wrinkle Remover with Fast 25s Heat-up HOMEASY is a brand that provides service for families and individuals. We strive to provide products to improve the quality of everyone's life. At the same time, HOMEASY has been enriching and perfecting ourselves and will create more possibilities for everyone! We are committed to Smart Home, Easy Life!

1* Travel Clothes Steamer1* Brush Attachment1* Storage Bag1* User Manual HOMEASY Portable Handheld Garment Steamer for Clothes HOMEASY handheld steamer for clothes is a perfect helper as it effectively removes wrinkles with 45% more steam output per minute.The 7-hole nozzle and wide steam exit penetrates steam into more fabric area thoroughly and the 20G/MIN steam flow comes out powerfully and evenly to remove the toughest wrinkles. Preheating Time: 25s Power：1000W Constant Steaming: 8 mins Water Tank Capacity: 150ML Special Features: Detachable Water Tank & Compact Size

Convenient & Time-saving Our HOMEASY portable clothes steamer preheats in 25s and fresh your clothes in no time! Excellent Performance 20G/MIN steam comes out powerfully and evenly to remove wrinkles and bring elegance! Powerful & Efficient They can be used for all kinds of materials. Large water tank capacity of 150ML can be used for about 3-4 T-shirt with 1000W powerful steam.

One Button for Steam Output Flashing White: Preheating.Solid White: Preheating finished.You know exactly when to start using your steamer. Easy to use. Powerful Steam This fabric steamer ensures quick steaming performances in less than 25 seconds, you can de-wrinkle anytime at home or on travel.Small size, powerful energy. Useful Brush Head The steam iron comes with a brush head which help remove the lint from clothes and clean visible dust from fabric. Compact Size Our Handheld Clothes Steamer is compact enough with pulm size to bring in your suitcase when traveling or bussiness. It also includes a travel pouch for easy storage.

Step 1: Pour water into the tank (no more than the highest level). Step 2: Install the water tank. Step 3: Plug in power. The indicator flashes white, please wait for about 25s. When the LCD light becomes solid white, the preheating is finished. Step 4: Press the steam button for ironing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this a few months ago and having been using it almost every day since. Took it to a wedding and everyone was using it. It’s perfect for travel but I also love how it’s lightweight and good for everyday use on uniforms. I haven’t found the brush attachment useful but maybe I just haven’t used it correctly. I let it cool how it says so scalding despite daily use. I use distilled water so I can definitely see this steamer lasting me a long time. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The HOMEASY Clothes Steamer Travel edition has quickly become my go-to companion for wrinkle-free clothes while on the go. As a frequent traveler, I'm always looking for compact and efficient solutions, and this handheld steamer has exceeded my expectations in every way.Travel-Friendly Design: The compact size of this clothes steamer makes it an absolute breeze to pack for travels. Whether you're jetting off on a business trip or embarking on a vacation, this steamer fits snugly into your luggage without taking up valuable space.Effective Performance: Despite its small size, the HOMEASY Handheld Steamer delivers impressive results. It effortlessly tackles wrinkles and creases on various fabrics, ensuring my clothes always look crisp and presentable. I especially appreciate its quick heating time, allowing me to get my attire ready in minutes.A Travel Essential: I recently tested this steamer during a work trip to Washington, DC, and I couldn't have been more pleased with the results. It made a noticeable difference in the appearance of my clothes, helping me maintain a professional look throughout my busy schedule.Convenience at Its Best: One of the standout features of this steamer is its user-friendly design. The comfortable grip and easy-to-use controls make the steaming process a breeze, even for those new to garment steamers.In summary, the HOMEASY Clothes Steamer Travel edition has become essential to my travel toolkit. Its compact size, effective performance, and convenience make it a standout choice for anyone constantly moving. If you're looking for a reliable and efficient way to keep your clothes wrinkle-free while traveling, I wholeheartedly recommend trying this handheld steamer. It's a game-changer for maintaining a polished appearance on your journeys!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for travel. Heats up quickly and gets the job done

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Piece of crap
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product and the biggest mistake was I didn’t try it before I packed it on a long vacation halfway around the world. This gave about 30 seconds of steam and never worked after that!! When I got back, my window to return had lapsed so now am stuck with a heavy piece of crap that is useless. I emailed the seller for a replacement or refund and CRICKETS!! DO. NOT. BUY. THIS!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's so convenient
reviews.reviewText: It's does its job and it's so small and sturdy I was pleasantly surprised! It was up in about 1 minute. I had a floor lenth book skirt and it did the whole skirt without needing more water, I love it !! I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best in its class
reviews.reviewText: One of my best purchases in Amazon. Actually, I 1st came across it with my friends when I used it- it worked so well so I bought my own. I travel almost 2x a year & this is one of the best in its class. I’ve taken a few with me in the past & I never took them with me again) This looks very promising.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Could use more power
reviews.reviewText: Incredibly compact and easy for traveling but I wish it put off more steam. I bought it for when I went to a out-of-town wedding.. I was excited at first but when I went to use it, it took much too long. I was constantly refilling and steaming my dress before the event, that I ended up being 20 min late. Really wanted to love it but I doubt I'll ever use it again now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for cost of product
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product over all. It's easy to use, works well and is fairly compact. Everything does fit in the travel bag but you have to place it a certain way and it's a little snug. I gave this 4 stars because it does take quite a while (15-20 minutes) to cool down, best to use when you don't need to pack it up right away.
Es muy útil porque se desarma y se puede acomodar de muchas maneras y tiene su bolsa para guardarla lo único que malo es que es un poco mas pesada de lo que esperaba
I love my travel steamer. It is small enough that I take it every time I travel. It even came with a little mitt so you don’t burn yourself!
